title: Sports
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Stefan Vaaks Scores 15 Second-Half Points in Providence Comeback Over St. John's
items.description: Stefan Vaaks scored 15 second-half points, as Providence rallied to beat St. John's despite Zuby Ejiofor's 33-point performance.
